answer: The letter e. End, timE, spacE, Every placE
question: I am the beginning of the end, and the end of time and space. I am essential to creation, and I surround every place. What am I?
What English word has three consecutive double letters?
What always runs but never walks, often murmurs, never talks, has a bed but never sleeps, has a mouth but never eats?
At night they come without being fetched. By day they are lost without being stolen. What are they?
Ripped from my mother’s womb, Beaten and burned, I become a blood thirsty killer. What am I?
